summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5830 for the improvement of 34th Avenue North, from East John Street to a connection with the existing watermain at the south line of Coulter's Addition; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 76820 as amended by Ordinance No. 76891, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
